=== ''' CLOUD DIAGNOSTICS (LWMOCLOUD) ''' ===

------------------------------------------------------------------------
r8574 | uandrae | 2010-10-28 09:35:45 +0200 (Thu, 28 Oct 2010) | 5 lines

Lisa Bengtsson: Cloud diagnostic updates
- Implement cloud class diagnostics based on geopotential height in AROME. With NAMPHY2:LWMOCLOUD=T the height for low/medium/high clouds are based on geopotential height rather than on eta level as in the current method, the change only effects the diagnostics of clouds. LWMOCLOUD=F as default.
-Implement maximum-random weighted overlap assumptions following C. Wittman approach for ALARO also in AROME. The weighted assumptions are activated setting NAMPHY:LACPANMX=T. The weight used is NAMPHY0:WMXOV. With WMXOV=1, maximum overlap is used. LACPANMXP=F as default.
-Change the default value of LWMOCLOUD, and LACPANPX to TRUE in ALARO (harmonie), with the weight WMXOV=0.81 based on 60 levels

This is already implemented in acnpart.F90 and suphy2.F90

Files found for r8574:
  arp/phys_dmn/apl_arome.F90


[[BR]]

=== ''' FULLPOS LCRITSNOWTEMP ''' ===

Trygve Asplien

A new namelist variable LCRITSNOWTEMP and a new horizontal correction 
method (ICORR=7) aimed for snow is introduced in fullpos. This correction 
does not remove snow depending on a critical surface temperature (normally 273.16K)

Default is the old way of doing it (LCRITSNOWTEMP=.true.) 
LCRITSNOWTEMP must be set to false to use the new method

r10055 | uandrae | 2011-12-05 10:53:38 +0100 (Mon, 05 Dec 2011) | 15 lines

Lisa Bengtsson: Updates to CA scheme

=== ''' Rasch Kristjansson ( ALARO ) ''' ===

------------------------------------------------------------------------
r10056 | uandrae | 2011-12-05 10:58:18 +0100 (Mon, 05 Dec 2011) | 40 lines

Lisa Bengtsson & Karl-Ivar Ivarsson: Updates to RK scheme
General description:
The additional code, and modifications to existing code regards the computations of condensation minus evaporation in the Rasch-Kristjansson scheme.

aplpar.F90:

   1.  Initialization of RK historic fields of T, qv, and qc
   2.  Replace double call to acnebcond.F90 by an analytical solution of dRH/dCloud
   3.  Correction of computation of increment containing Qv due to turbulent diffusion
   4.  Correction of RK-tendency computations (correction of sign)
   5.  Add PTW wet-bulb temperature in the call to accdev.F90


accdev.F90:

   1.  Add PTW as input argument
   2.  Add calls to hlevapprec.F90 and hlsnowmelt.F90 for computation of evaporation and melting of rain and snow.
   3.  Bug-correction in computation of ZCMEC1


acnebcond.F90:

   1.  Modifications and cleaning in RK-scheme


accvud.F90:

   1.  Initialization of CA specific variables
   2.  Updated computations of where the CA should be active as a function of CAPE
   3.  Tuning


Tests on ECMWF platform:
 
No data assimilation, 12 hour forecast, ifs boundaries, surfex, no dfi, alaro-physics, domain = sweden_5.5.

   1.  LRKCDEV = FALSE to compare with reference (i.e none of the new code is activated and this experiment should not influence any meteorological fields). No impact on norms.
   2.  LRKCDEV = TRUE and LXRCDEV = FALSE (activate RK-scheme). Results looks reasonable.

=== ''' LSMIXBC ( Large scale mixing of background field ) ''' ===

Ole Vignes

Introduce option LSMIXBC, resembles LSMIX in Hirlam but instead
of running re-forecasts the large scale waves of the first boundary
file is mixed with small scale waves from the model's own first guess
before assimilation. For technical reasons the computations are done
in Canari (conf 701). To be replaced by Jk at some stage.

[https://hirlam.org/trac/attachment/wiki/HarmonieSystemDocumentation/lsmixbc.ppt Presentation]

=== ''' CANARI / OI_MAIN / SURFEX / EKF ''' ===

Trygve Aspelien, Mariken Homleid

* OI_main updates
  - read SST/LST directly in OI_main, instead of passing them through CANARI, in the case of no SST analysis
  - update SST and LST in separate routines that can be called from both OI_MAIN and VARASSIM 
  - calculate T2m and RH2m increments in all grid points when running with SURFEX
  - update surface temperature, water and ice at all NATURE points based on these increments

   snow cover in the initialized fields
